Package com.zhuinden.simplestack

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Backstack.CompletionListener
    CompletionListener allows you to listen to when a StateChange has been completed.
    BackstackManager.StateClearStrategy
    Specifies the strategy to be used in order to delete SavedStates that are no longer needed after a StateChange, when there is no pending StateChange left.
    Bundleable
    Specifies that the custom view that implements this also places its persisted state into a StateBundle.
    KeyFilter
    This class allows you to clear keys from your history to be restored, that the app does not need to restore.
    KeyParceler
    An interface to allow using any key in the backstack, as long as it is possible to persist and restore it as a Parcelable.
    StateChanger
    The StateChanger handles the StateChanges that occur within the Backstack.
    StateChanger.Callback
    When the StateChange is complete, then the callback must be called.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Backstack
    The Backstack holds the current state, in the form of a list of Objects.
    BackstackDelegate
    A delegate class that manages the Backstack's Activity lifecycle integration, and provides view-state persistence for custom views that are associated with a key using KeyContextWrapper.
    BackstackDelegate.NonConfigurationInstance
    The class which stores the BackstackManager for surviving configuration change.
    BackstackManager
    The backstack manager manages a Backstack internally, and wraps it with the ability of persisting view state and the backstack history itself.
    DefaultKeyFilter
    The default KeyFilter which does not remove any keys, just restores all provided keys.
    DefaultKeyParceler
    Default key parceler implementation that assumes your keys are Parcelable.
    DefaultStateClearStrategy
    A default strategy that clears the state for all keys that are not found in the new state.
    HistoryBuilder
    Convenience class for creating ArrayList of Objects, for backstack history.
    KeyContextWrapper
    ContextWrapper for inflating views, containing the key inside it.
    SavedState
    A container for the view hierarchy state and an optional Bundle.
    SavedState.Builder
    A builder class that allows creating SavedState instances.
    StateChange
    Contains the previous and the new state that represents the change in state.
